Oct. 11, 1997 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium - Treherbert Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 8 bands competed.
March 26, 2012, 6:29 p.m. July 3, 2020, 2:54 p.m.
1 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
2 Markham and District Band James Jones
3 Blaina & District Bernard Williams
4 Newport Borough Band Colin Hogg
5 Pontypool Brass Robert Burnett
6 Ebbw Vale Band William Cross
7 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band J. Wynne Williams
8 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
